## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ed1e88a3c78f796f7eeace3f7c199359f944758fe8abb6555b4f199058be2138)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'openai-realtime-console' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
